summary: Setting of Aela was changed a little.
descriptionHtml:
----------------
Aela Plus (ver1.0)
----------------

Setting of Aela was changed a little.

1. Aela was made into non-death.  (Essential : ON)

2. Aela can do spare clothing freely.  (Default Outfit : NONE, Outfit was moved to Iventory.)

3. Aela can have the weight of luggage will increase 5000 . (Ability : Powerful Aela 5000)


[color=green]There are many other similar MOD .
Please use it according to your environment. [/color]

[color=red]Please be sure to back up your save data .[/color]


---
Author : hdela


---
This mod was built with Skyrim US Ver 1.5.xx.x


---
Installation : Unzip the file, and drop the data folder into your Skyrim Data directory. 


---
v1.0 : First MOD

[color=yellow]>Found 2-3 sets of armor.[/color]

Default Armor is already registered into the save file. 
In that case, the armor obtained by MOD will also be added. 

[color=yellow]>She becomes nakedness. [/color]

Since Default Outfit is set as NONE, her fundamental clothes are \"nakedness.\" 


---
Enjoy!

by hdela
author: hdela
